abstract: Rexchip Electronics, a memory-chip joint venture between Japan’s Elpida Memory and Taiwan’s Powerchip Semiconductor, is eying an initial public offering in Taiwan this year, Dow Jones reported.
snippet: Rexchip Electronics, a memory-chip joint venture between Japan’s Elpida Memory and Taiwan’s Powerchip Semiconductor, is eying an initial public offering in Taiwan this year, Dow Jones reported.
lead_paragraph: Rexchip Electronics, a memory-chip joint venture between Japan’s Elpida Memory and Taiwan’s Powerchip Semiconductor, is weighing an initial public offering in Taiwan this year, Dow Jones reported.
